"We were happy with the price, the service, and the timeliness!" "Great experience communication was easy and the roof looks amazing !" "Couldn’t be happier – I’ll definitely recommend them to friends and family."

Peace of Mind just finished installing our new roof two weeks ago. They were so excellent to work with from start to finish. We had reached an impass with our insurance company that the owner, Jeff, took on and got figured out after months … More
